dr.evomodel.coalescent
Class AbstractCoalescentLikelihood

java.lang.Object
  dr.inference.model.AbstractModel
      dr.inference.model.AbstractModelLikelihood
          dr.evomodel.coalescent.AbstractCoalescentLikelihood
All Implemented Interfaces:
Units, Loggable, Likelihood, Model, ModelListener, StatisticList, VariableListener, MPISerializable, Identifiable, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CoalescentLikelihood
public abstract class AbstractCoalescentLikelihood
extends AbstractModelLikelihood
implements Units

Forms a base class for a number of coalescent likelihood calculators.

Version:
$Id: CoalescentLikelihood.java,v 1.43 2006/07/28 11:27:32 rambaut Exp $
Author:
Andrew Rambaut, Alexei Drummond

handleVariableChangedEvent

protected void handleVariableChangedEvent(Variable variable,
                                          int index,
                                          Variable.ChangeType type)
Description copied from class: AbstractModel
This method is called whenever a parameter is changed.

It is strongly recommended that the model component sets a "dirty" flag and does no further calculations. Recalculation is typically done when the model component is asked for some information that requires them. This mechanism is 'lazy' so that this method can be safely called multiple times with minimal computational cost.

Specified by:
handleVariableChangedEvent in class AbstractModel

storeState

protected final void storeState()
Stores the precalculated state: in this case the intervals

Specified by:
storeState in class AbstractModel

restoreState

protected final void restoreState()
Restores the precalculated state: that is the intervals of the tree.

Specified by:
restoreState in class AbstractModel

acceptState

protected final void acceptState()
Description copied from class: AbstractModel
This call specifies that the current state is accept. Most models will not need to do anything. Sub-models are handled automatically and do not need to be considered in this method.

Specified by:
acceptState in class AbstractModel

getExcludedMRCAs

protected java.util.Set<NodeRef> getExcludedMRCAs(Tree tree)
Returns:
an array of noderefs that represent the MRCAs of subtrees to exclude from coalescent prior. May return null if no subtrees should be excluded.
